Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.entity.Personnel

Class Student

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Entity
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Personnel.Personnel
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Personnel.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Entity>
public class Student extends Personnel
Represents a student in the examination system. This class extends the Personnel class and provides specific functionality for managing student information such as username, age, department, name, and password.
See Also:

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(String username)
      Sets the username for the student. Validates the username length and checks for spaces and existing usernames in the database.
      Overrides:
      setUsername in class Personnel
      Parameters:
      username - The username to set.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the username is invalid or already occupied.

    • forceSetUsername

      public void forceSetUsername(String username)
      Forcefully sets the username for the student without checking for existing usernames.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to set.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the username is invalid.
